author: Unknown

author: Unknown

author: Unknown
quote: I love you more than any word can say, I love you more than any action I take.

author: Maya Angelou

author: Unknown

author: Unknown

author: Unknown

author: Unknown
quote: All stories about true love are endless.

author: Unknown

author: Unknown
quote: Sometimes I can’t see myself when I’m with you. I can only just see you.

author: Arthur Rubinstein

author: Unknown
quote: Come live in my heart and pay no rent.

author: Unknown

author: Unknown

author: Unknown
quote: Where there is Love, There is Life.

author: Unknown

author: Unknown

author: William Shakespeare

author: Unknown

author: Unknown

author: Coy Bowles

author: Unknown
quote: A simple ‘I love you’ means more than money.

author: William Shakespeare
quote: The course of true love never did run smooth.

author: Unknown
quote: Love never dies a natural death. It dies of blindness and errors and betrayals.

author: Marilyn Monroe

author: Jodi Picoult
quote: You don't love someone because they're perfect, you love them in spite of the fact that they're not.

author: Jane Austen

author: Saint Teresa of Avila

author: Unknown
quote: True love always brings the sense of security into your home.

author: Unknown
quote: Thinking of you keeps me awake. Dreaming of you keeps me asleep. Being with you keeps me alive.

author: Suzanne Collins
quote: I can feel Peeta press his forehead into my temple and he asks, 'So now that you've got me, what are you going to do with me?' I turn into him. 'Put you somewhere you can't get hurt.

author: Adele
quote: You only learn to love again when you fall in love again.

author: Mother Teresa

author: Unknown
quote: After all this time? Always.

author: Unknown

author: Unknown

author: Unknown

author: Unknown

author: Jean de La Fontaine

author: Unknown

author: Unknown

author: Unknown

author: Unknown
quote: When someone you love becomes a memory… That memory becomes a treasure.

author: Unknown
quote: When I look into your eyes, I know I have found the mirror of my soul.

author: Unknown
quote: You have bewitched me, body and soul.

quote: What she had realized was that love was that moment when your heart was about to burst.

author: Kyle Chandler
quote: I really love to ride my motorcycle. When I want to just get away and be by myself and clear my head, that's what I do.

author: Unknown
quote: I have the place, which you can touch, and it'll make me crazy… It's my heart!

author: Tom Robbins
quote: We waste time looking for the perfect lover instead of creating the perfect love.

author: Veronica Roth
quote: I wonder if fears ever really go away, or if they just lose their power over us.

author: Unknown

quote: Where there is love there is life.

author: Yogi Berra
quote: Love is the most important thing in the world, but baseball is pretty good, too.

author: Unknown

author: Unknown

author: Unknown

author: Jodi Picoult

author: Unknown

author: Unknown

author: Unknown
quote: Real Life is a prize in the game named life.

author: Unknown

author: Unknown
quote: Two people in love, alone, isolated from the world, that’s beautiful.

author: Unknown
quote: Nobody has the ability to make me as weightless and carefree as you can.

author: Unknown

author: Unknown

author: Unknown

author: Unknown

author: Unknown

author: Unknown

author: Unknown
quote: Never give up on something you can’t go a day without thinking about.

author: Unknown
quote: I am a fan of your smile. But the fact, that the reason of your smile is me, makes me crazy!

author: Unknown
quote: I look at you and see the rest of my life in front of my eyes.

author: Unknown

author: Tahereh Mafi

author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

author: Unknown

author: Unknown

author: Unknown

author: Melanie Clark

author: Jane Austen

author: Unknown

author: Unknown
quote: I wish I’d done everything on earth with you.

author: Tom Robbins
quote: We waste time looking for the perfect lover, instead of creating the perfect love.

author: Unknown

author: Jesus Christ

author: Bruce Lee
quote: If you love life, don't waste time, for time is what life is made up of.

author: Leo Tolstoy
quote: Respect was invented to cover the empty place where love should be.

author: Unknown
quote: I love you and it’s getting worse.

author: Garth Brooks

author: Paulo Coelho

quote: But I say to you, Love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you, so that you may be sons of your Father who is in heaven; for he makes his sun rise on the evil and on the good, and sends rain on the just and on the unjust.

author: Bob Marley

author: Nicholas Sparks

author: William Shakespeare
quote: Love all, trust a few, do wrong to none.

author: Ernest Hemingway
quote: The most painful thing is losing yourself in the process of loving someone too much, and forgetting that you are special too.

author: A.A. Milne

author: Dr. Seuss
quote: You know when you’re in love when you can’t fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams.

author: Unknown
quote: You will ask me if I love you. I will answer “Yes, forever!”

author: Unknown
quote: Our love is like the wind. I can’t see it, but I feel it.

author: Leo Christopher
quote: There is a madness in loving you, a lack of reason that makes it feel so flawless.

author: Maya Angelou

author: Unknown
quote: You are near, Even if I don’t see you. You are with me, even if you are far away. You are in my heart, in my thoughts, in my life always.

author: Unknown
quote: You call it madness but I call it love.

author: Nicholas Sparks
quote: I don't know that love changes. People change. Circumstances change.

author: Unknown
quote: No measure of time with you will be long enough.

author: Rumi

author: Amy Purdy

author: Unknown
quote: When we`re together, I don`t need other people and things. Everything I need is the time…

author: Ferdinand Foch
quote: The most powerful weapon on earth is the human soul on fire.

author: Vincent van Gogh
quote: It is good to love many things, for therein lies the true strength, and whosoever loves much performs much, and can accomplish much, and what is done in love is well done.

author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

author: Unknown
quote: Love is like the wind, you can’t see it but you can feel it.

author: Jim Morrison
quote: Love cannot save you from your own fate.

author: Elizabeth Gilbert

author: Unknown
quote: You are my best friend, my human diary and my other half. You mean the world to me and I LOVE YOU.

author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Sr.
quote: Love is the master key that opens the gates of happiness, of hatred, of jealousy, and, most easily of all, the gate of fear.

author: Unknown
quote: I have loved you all my life; it has just taken me this long to find you.

author: Unknown
quote: I’m much more me when I’m with you.

author: Colin Firth
quote: It's a very dangerous state. You are inclined to recklessness and kind of tune out the rest of your life and everything that's been important to you. It's actually not all that pleasurable. I don't know who the hell wants to get in a situation where you can't bear an hour without somebody's company.

author: Unknown
quote: A flower cannot blossom without sunshine a man cannot live without love.

author: Unknown
quote: When you truly love someone, no distance or amount of time can tear you apart. Sure, it would be easier to move on, but being with anyone else would just be settling. The days are lonely and the nights are worse but when you have a love that strong… never lit it go. It may be hard but God knows it will be worth it.

author: François de La Rochefoucauld

author: Unknown
quote: Don`t worry that you hold my hand only sometimes. Because you have a chance to hold my heart forever.

author: Unknown
quote: True love is not easy. It arises only after shared ups and downs, common sufferings and the fun you have together.

author: George Chakiris
quote: No matter how dark the moment, love and hope are always possible.

author: Unknown

author: Cindy Morgan

author: Jimmy Dean
quote: Love is an ice cream sundae, with all the marvelous coverings. Sex is the cherry on top.

author: Unknown
quote: When you believe in a thing, believe in it all the way, implicitly and unquestionably.

author: Buddha
quote: You, yourself, as much as anybody in the entire universe, deserve your love and affection.

author: David A. Bednar

author: Mother Teresa

author: Amy Poehler
quote: You deserve love, and you’ll get it.

author: David Frost

author: Julian Lennon

author: Unknown
quote: You’re nothing short of my everything.

quote: Love of beauty is taste. The creation of beauty is art.

author: Unknown
quote: It was a million tiny little things that, when you added them all up, they meant we were supposed to be together…

author: Unknown
quote: Have you ever missed someone so much that even the thought of them made you burst into tears?

author: Martin Luther King Jr.

author: Unknown

author: Jimi Hendrix
quote: When the power of love overcomes the love of power, the world will know peace.

author: Unknown
quote: I don`t believe in magic, I believe in true love.

author: Charles Dickens

author: Unknown

quote: Be strong, believe in freedom and in God, love yourself, understand your sexuality, have a sense of humor, masturbate, don't judge people by their religion, color or sexual habits, love life and your family.

author: Anaïs Nin

author: Washington Irving

author: Marcus Aurelius

author: Unknown
quote: You meet true love only when you begin to value your partner`s happiness more than yours.

author: Unknown
quote: When I saw you I fell in love and you smiled because you knew.

author: Unknown
quote: I’m all yours.

author: Unknown

author: Unknown

author: Unknown

author: Maya Angelou

author: Unknown

author: Unknown

author: Unknown

author: Unknown

author: Unknown

author: Unknown

author: Unknown
quote: Y love really means.

quote: Money can buy you a fine dog, but only love can make him wag his tail.

author: Mignon McLaughlin

author: Unknown

quote: Real love cannot be selfish under no circumstances. If you want to have a real love, be ready to sacrifice!

author: Eckhart Tolle
quote: To know yourself as the Being underneath the thinker, the stillness underneath the mental noise, the love and joy underneath the pain, is freedom, salvation, enlightenment.

author: Herman Hesse
quote: If I know what love is, it is because of you.

author: Unknown
quote: You can’t blame gravity for falling in love.

author: Mike White
quote: A flower doesn't love you or hate you, it just exists.

author: Unknown
quote: To love is to receive a glimpse of heaven.

author: Unknown
quote: Walk with me through life…and I’ll have everything I’ll need for the journey.

author: Unknown
quote: The ability to wait is the sign of true love. Be patient, and you`ll get everything you want.

author: Unknown
quote: You cannot create a happy marriage with the person you can live with. You should marry the person you cannot live without!

author: Zane Grey
quote: Love grows more tremendously full, swift, poignant, as the years multiply.

author: Maya Angelou
quote: Have enough courage to trust love one more time and always one more time.

author: Sarah Dessen
quote: There is never a time or place for true love. It happens accidentally, in a heartbeat, in a single flashing, throbbing moment.

author: Unknown
quote: There is only happiness in life, to love and to be loved.

author: Jacob Batalon
quote: I like to think I'm a pretty good friend. I love having a good time, and I enjoy being able to share those good times with others.

author: Paulo Coelho
quote: This is what we call love. When you are loved, you can do anything in creation. When you are loved, there’s no need at all to understand what’s happening, because everything happens within you.

author: Julia Roberts
quote: Don’t forget I’m just a girl, standing in front of a boy, asking him to love her.

author: Kristen Wiig
quote: I love the rain. It's my favorite weather.

author: Bob Marley
quote: If she's amazing, she won't be easy. If she's easy, she won't be amazing. If she's worth it, you wont give up. If you give up, you're not worthy. ... Truth is, everybody is going to hurt you; you just gotta find the ones worth suffering for.

author: Jane Austen
quote: You pierce my soul. I am half agony, half hope…I have loved none but you.

author: Unknown
quote: A life lived in love will never be dull.

author: Unknown
quote: I love you like a fat kid loves cake.

author: Charles Dickens
quote: Never close your lips to those whom you have already opened your heart.

author: Victor Hugo
quote: What is love? I have met in the streets a very poor young man who was in love. His hat was old, his coat worn, the water passed through his shoes and the stars through his soul.

author: Unknown
quote: Don`t be afraid of waiting. True love will always be back.

author: Unknown
quote: You have bewitched me body and soul, and I love, I love, I love you.

author: Jonathan Larson
quote: Give in to love, or live in fear.

author: Lady Gaga
quote: Some women choose to follow men, and some women choose to follow their dreams. If you’re wondering which way to go, remember that your career will never wake up and tell you that it doesn’t love you anymore.

author: Unknown
quote: Let us always meet each other with smile, for the smile is the beginning of love.

author: Unknown
quote: Distance is to love what wind is to fire. Extinguishes the small, but ignites the great.

author: H. L. Mencken
quote: Love is like war: easy to begin but very hard to stop.

author: W. Somerset Maugham
quote: We are not the same persons this year as last; nor are those we love. It is a happy chance if we, changing, continue to love a changed person.

author: Unknown
quote: I need you like a heart needs a beat.

author: Nicholas Sparks
quote: The greater the love, the greater the tragedy when it's over.

author: Unknown
quote: A thousand miles can’t keep me away from you.

author: Unknown
quote: Sometimes, it’s not just about missing someone, it’s wondering if they’re missing you too.

author: Ginger Rogers
quote: My love for ice cream emerged at an early age - and has never left!

author: Anais Nin
quote: Do not seek the because—in love there is no because, no reason, no explanation, no solutions.

author: Unknown
quote: Only love of a good woman can make a bad man change himself.

author: Friedrich Nietzsche
quote: It is not a lack of love, but a lack of friendship that makes unhappy marriages.

author: C.S. Lewis
quote: To love at all is to be vulnerable. Love anything and your heart will be wrung and possibly broken. If you want to make sure of keeping it intact you must give it to no one, not even an animal. Wrap it carefully round with hobbies and little luxuries; avoid all entanglements. Lock it up safe in the casket or coffin of your selfishness. But in that casket, safe, dark, motionless, airless, it will change. It will not be broken; it will become unbreakable, impenetrable, irredeemable. To love is to be vulnerable.

author: Ellen Key
quote: Love is moral even without legal marriage, but marriage is immoral without love.

author: Lawrence Welk
quote: Never trust anyone completely but God. Love people, but put your full trust only in God.

author: Arrigo Boito
quote: When I saw you I fell in love, and you smiled because you knew.

author: Unknown
quote: I don`t need the whole world to love me. I just need one person. You know this person well: it`s you!

author: Unknown
quote: “I love you” means that I will love you and stand by you even through the worst of times.

author: Unknown
quote: Always choose to be in love, not to fall in love.

author: Derek Jeter
quote: I love it when people doubt me. It makes me work harder to prove them wrong.

author: Unknown
quote: After all this time, I still miss you everyday.

author: Max Lucado
quote: A woman's heart should be so hidden in God that a man has to seek Him just to find her.

author: Marilyn Monroe
quote: If you can make a woman laugh, you can make her do anything.

author: Leo Tolstoy
quote: All, everything that I understand, I only understand because I love.

author: Unknown
quote: I will not tell you different stories about love. Not because I don`t love you. It`s because I am going to make my own love story with you!

author: Pietro Aretino
quote: I love you, and because I love you, I would sooner have you hate me for telling you the truth than adore me for telling you lies.

author: Robert Frost
quote: Love is an irresistible desire to be irresistibly desired.

author: Barbara De Angelis
quote: Marriage is not a noun; it's a verb. It isn't something you get. It's something you do. It's the way you love your partner every day.

author: Saint Augustine
quote: What does love look like? It has the hands to help others. It has the feet to hasten to the poor and needy. It has eyes to see misery and want. It has the ears to hear the sighs and sorrows of men. That is what love looks like.

author: Oscar Wilde
quote: You don't love someone for their looks, or their clothes, or for their fancy car, but because they sing a song only you can hear.

author: Chuck Palahniuk
quote: Find joy in everything you choose to do. Every job, relationship, home... it's your responsibility to love it, or change it.

author: Lord Byron
quote: There is pleasure in the pathless woods, there is rapture in the lonely shore, there is society where none intrudes, by the deep sea, and music in its roar; I love not Man the less, but Nature more.

author: Conor Oberst
quote: I really just want to be warm yellow light that pours over everyone I love.

author: Frank Sinatra
quote: Alcohol may be man's worst enemy, but the bible says love your enemy.

author: Unknown
quote: It doesn`t matter that a man found the fire: only a woman can play with it.

author: Zora Neale Hurston
quote: Love makes your soul crawl out from its hiding place.

author: Unknown
quote: It’s hard to forget someone who gave you so much to remember.

author: Unknown
quote: I'm much more me when I'm with you.

author: Nicholas Sparks
quote: Someday you'll find someone special again. People who've been in love once usually do. It's in their nature.

author: Unknown
quote: Real love can be compared with UFO: all people talk about it, but only a few have seen it!

author: Matt Lauer
quote: I am blessed to be surrounded by the people I love. I thank them for their patience and grace.

author: Unknown
quote: I love how she makes me feel, like anything is possible, or like life is worth it.

author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld
quote: However rare true love may be, it is less so than true friendship.

author: A. A. Milne
quote: If you live to be a hundred, I want to live to be a hundred minus one day so I never have to live without you.

author: Unknown
quote: I love you with all my circle not my heart because heart breaks and circles go on forever.

author: Madonna
quote: To be brave is to love someone unconditionally, without expecting anything in return.

author: Esha Gupta
quote: You need a strong family because at the end, they will love you and support you unconditionally. Luckily, I have my dad, mom and sister.

author: Unknown
quote: You have no idea how hard it is to force myself to stop thinking about you sometimes.

author: Sigmund Freud
quote: We are never so defensless against suffering as when we love.

author: Unknown
quote: If you want to find true love, you should be able not only forgive, but also forget.

author: Unknown
quote: It`s easy t say “I love you”. But it`s hard to wait and prove your words.

author: The Notebook
quote: The best love is the kind that awakens the soul; that makes us reach for more, that plants the fire in our hearts and brings peace to our minds. That’s what I hope to give you forever.

author: Unknown
quote: A youth with his first cigar makes himself sick.

author: Rainbow Rowell
quote: Holding Eleanor's hand was like holding a butterfly. Or a heartbeat. Like holding something complete, and completely alive.

author: Khalil Gibran
quote: Life without love is like a tree without blossoms or fruit.

author: Unknown
quote: When you realize you want to spend the rest of your life with somebody, you want the rest of your life to start as soon as possible.

author: Elie Wiesel
quote: Friendship marks a life even more deeply than love. Love risks degenerating into obsession, friendship is never anything but sharing.

author: Unknown
quote: The most important thing in life is to learn how to give out love and to let it come in.

author: Simon Cowell
quote: People confuse ego, lust, insecurity with true love.

author: Fyodor Dostoyevsky
quote: What is hell? I maintain that it is the suffering of being unable to love.

author: Lauren Oliver
quote: I love you. Remember. They cannot take it

author: Rainer Maria Rilke
quote: Love consists in this, that two solitudes protect and touch and greet each other.

author: Henry Drummond
quote: To love abundantly is to live abundantly, and to love forever is to live forever.

author: Farrah Fawcett
quote: My number one goal is to love, support and be there for my son.

author: Lord of The Rings
quote: I would rather spend one lifetime with you, than face all the ages of this world alone.

author: Peter Ustinov
quote: Love is an act of endless forgiveness, a tender look which becomes a habit.

author: Unknown
quote: I don’t care if we talk about absolutely nothing, I just want to talk to you.

author: Unknown
quote: True love will never die. Even after your death, it will exist in the air.

author: Rafael Nadal
quote: I love the beach. I love the sea. All my life I live within - in front of the sea.

author: Unknown
quote: When your love is true, you see all your partner`s faults, but still, love them. I don`t mean you have faults, I mean I love you despite them!

author: Unknown
quote: Sex alleviates tension. Love causes it.

author: Paul Sweeney
quote: A wedding anniversary is the celebration of love, trust, partnership, tolerance and tenacity. The order varies for any given year.

author: Charles Schulz
quote: All you need is love. But a little chocolate now and then doesn't hurt.

author: Unknown
quote: Life without love is like a tree without blossoms or fruit.

author: Jodi Picoult
quote: If you gave someone your heart and they died, did they take it with them? Did you spend the rest of forever with a hole inside you that couldn't be filled?

author: Brandon Jenner
quote: We can bring positive energy into our daily lives by smiling more, talking to strangers in line, replacing handshakes with hugs, and calling our friends just to tell them we love them.

author: Zig Ziglar
quote: The foundation stones for a balanced success are honesty, character, integrity, faith, love and loyalty.

author: Unknown
quote: You may only be one person to the world, but you may also be the world to one person

author: Henry Ward Beecher
quote: There is no friendship, no love, like that of the parent for the child.

author: Christian Louboutin
quote: If you do what you love, it is the best way to relax.

author: Pierre Teilhard de Chardin
quote: Love is a sacred reserve of energy; it is like the blood of spiritual evolution.

author: Friedrich Nietzsche
quote: We love life, not because we are used to living but because we are used to loving.

author: Unknown
quote: You are my song. You are my song of love.

author: Tom Hanks
quote: There's no substitute for a great love who says, 'No matter what's wrong with you, you're welcome at this table.'

author: Victor Hugo
quote: The greatest happiness of life is the conviction that we are loved; loved for ourselves, or rather, loved in spite of ourselves.

author: Dylan Lauren
quote: Believe in yourself, listen to your gut, and do what you love.

author: Unknown
quote: I`ll not let you dictate me who I am. But I let you be part of who I`ll become.

author: Bette Davis
quote: Pleasure of love lasts but a moment. Pain of love lasts a lifetime.

author: Rumi
quote: We are born of love; Love is our mother.

author: Unknown
quote: You`re my true love: natural, irrational and very important!

author: Angelita Lim
quote: I saw that you were perfect, and so I loved you. Then I saw that you were not perfect and I loved you even more.

author: Elizabeth Gilbert
quote: To be fully seen by somebody, then, and be loved anyhow  this is a human offering that can border on miraculous.

author: Marilyn Monroe
quote: I am good, but not an angel. I do sin, but I am not the devil. I am just a small girl in a big world trying to find someone to love.

author: Unknown
quote: A heart that loves is always young.

author: Kate Brown
quote: No individual, regardless of where they live or whom they love, should suffer discrimination.

author: Unknown
quote: Someone asked me if I missed you. I didn’t answer. I just closed my eyes and walked away and whispered ‘so much’.

author: Unknown
quote: As he read, I fell in love the way you fall asleep: slowly, and then all at once.

author: Barbara Hershey
quote: Yes, it was love at first sight. I feel that after all these years, I have finally found my soul mate.

author: Unknown
quote: Some love stories aren’t epic novels some are short stories.

author: Lao Tzu
quote: Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage.

author: Unknown
quote: Roses are red, violets are blue, I’m glad I’ve walked this world with you.

author: Heather Morris
quote: I love looking in the mirror and feeling good about what I see.

author: Unknown
quote: Do the math…

author: Vladimir Nabokov
quote: It was love at first sight, at last sight, at ever and ever sight.

author: Unknown
quote: You know you’re in love when you can’t sleep because reality is finally better than dreams.

author: Unknown
quote: Because I could watch you for a single minute and find a thousand things that I love about you.

author: Unknown
quote: Let us Flip the coin and see. Head, I am yours. Tail, you are mine. So, we won’t lose.

author: Theodor Reik
quote: In order to be happy oneself it is necessary to make at least one other person happy.

author: Unknown
quote: The purpose of the life is to find true love, not meaning. It`s easier to find the meaning of life together, not alone.

author: Unknown
quote: I keep myself busy with the things I do but everytime I pause, I still think of you.

author: John Lennon
quote: Love is a promise, love is a souvenir, once given never forgotten, never let it disappear.

author: Unknown
quote: Love is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies.

author: Thomas Carlyle
quote: A loving heart is the beginning of all knowledge.

author: Paulo Coelho
quote: Love is an untamed force. When we try to control it, it destroys us. When we try to imprison it, it enslaves us. When we try to understand it, it leaves us feeling lost and confused.

author: Haruki Murakami
quote: Despite your best efforts, people are going to be hurt when it's time for them to be hurt.

author: Unknown
quote: Love is blind. It will take over your mind. What you think is love, is truly not. You need to elevate your mind.

author: Thomas Aquinas
quote: The things that we love tell us what we are.

author: Gabriel García Márquez
quote: There is always something left to love.

author: Kirsten Dunst
quote: You can never control who you fall in love with, even when you're in the most sad, confused time of your life. You don't fall in love with people because they're fun. It just happens.

author: Gayle Forman
quote: Love, it never dies. It never goes away, it never fades, so long as you hang on to it. Love can make you immortal

author: Unknown
quote: Accept my heart and I’ll build you a castle with love as its foundation.

author: Unknown
quote: I`ll never stop loving you. And no matter what is happening, my heart is always with you!

author: Clive Barker
quote: Any fool can be happy. It takes a man with real heart to make beauty out of the stuff that makes us weep.

author: Unknown
quote: I want to die the day before you. So I will not have to live without you!

author: Rainbow Rowell
quote: What are the chances you’d ever meet someone like that? he wondered. Someone you could love forever, someone who would forever love you back? And what did you do when that person was born half a world away? The math seemed impossible.

author: Bob Marley
quote: Only once in your life, I truly believe, you find someone who can completely turn your world around. You tell them things that you’ve never shared with another soul and they absorb everything you say and actually want to hear more. You share hopes for the future, dreams that will never come true, goals that were never achieved and the many disappointments life has thrown at you. When something wonderful happens, you can’t wait to tell them about it, knowing they will share in your excitement. They are not embarrassed to cry with you when you are hurting or laugh with you when you make a fool of yourself. Never do they hurt your feelings or make you feel like you are not good enough, but rather they build you up and show you the things about yourself that make you special and even beautiful. There is never any pressure, jealousy or competition but only a quiet calmness when they are around. You can be yourself and not worry about what they will think of you because they love you for who you are. The things that seem insignificant to most people such as a note, song or walk become invaluable treasures kept safe in your heart to cherish forever. Memories of your childhood come back and are so clear and vivid it’s like being young again. Colours seem brighter and more brilliant. Laughter seems part of daily life where before it was infrequent or didn’t exist at all. A phone call or two during the day helps to get you through a long day’s work and always brings a smile to your face. In their presence, there’s no need for continuous conversation, but you find you’re quite content in just having them nearby. Things that never interested you before become fascinating because you know they are important to this person who is so special to you. You think of this person on every occasion and in everything you do. Simple things bring them to mind like a pale blue sky, gentle wind or even a storm cloud on the horizon. You open your heart knowing that there’s a chance it may be broken one day and in opening your heart, you experience a love and joy that you never dreamed possible. You find that being vulnerable is the only way to allow your heart to feel true pleasure that’s so real it scares you. You find strength in knowing you have a true friend and possibly a soul mate who will remain loyal to the end. Life seems completely different, exciting and worthwhile. Your only hope and security is in knowing that they are a part of your life.

author: Taylor Swift
quote: To me, Fearless is not the absense of fear. It's not being completely unafraid. To me, Fearless is having fears. Fearless is having doubts. Lots of them. To me, Fearless is living in spite of those things that scare you to death.

author: Mother Teresa
quote: Love is a fruit in season at all times, and within reach of every hand.

author: Unknown
quote: You know, I love you. I`ll always make myself available for you, even through the distances.

author: Unknown
quote: A million times I’ve needed you; A million times I’ve cried. If love alone could have saved you, you never would have died. In life I loved you dearly, in death I love you still. In my heart you hold a place no one else can ever fill. I broke my heart to lose you but you didn’t go alone. Part of me went with you the day God took you home.

author: Unknown
quote: And God shall wipe away all the tears from their eyes; and there shall be no more death, neither sorrow nor crying, neither shall there be any more pain: for the former things have passed away.

author: Unknown
quote: Love looks not with the eyes, but with the mind, and therefore is winged Cupid painted blind.

author: Nadia Comaneci
quote: Enjoy the journey and try to get better every day. And don't lose the passion and the love for what you do.

author: Henry David Thoreau
quote: Pursue some path, however narrow and crooked, in which you can walk with love and reverence.
